item.title: 'Living a nightmare': Families of teens missing after ski resort fire desperate for news
item.description: Families are appealing for information about children as young as 15 who are thought to have been at the bar.

item.title: Trump warns US will intervene if Iran kills protesters
item.description: The US president says "we will come to their rescue" after days of demonstrations and clashes.

item.title: China's BYD overtakes Tesla as world's top EV seller
item.description: It marks the first time the Chinese firm has outpaced its American rival for annual sales.

item.title: Yemen escalation reveals rift between Gulf powers Saudi Arabia and UAE
item.description: A confrontation between the Gulf powers over southern Yemen has left the country's future in the balance.

item.title: US slashes proposed tariffs on Italian pasta imports
item.description: The plan to impose steep tariffs on 13 producers could have seen major price rises for US consumers.
